tasks.label: Auto Test on Save
tasks.command: cargo install cargo-watch --quiet && cargo watch -x "test" -w sewer56-archives-r3a/src

tasks.label: Auto Miri Test on Save
tasks.command: cargo install cargo-watch --quiet && cargo watch -x "miri test" -w sewer56-archives-r3a/src

tasks.label: Auto Test on Save (32bit Big Endian)
tasks.command: cargo install cargo-watch cross --quiet && cargo watch -w sewer56-archives-r3a/src -- cross test --target powerpc-unknown-linux-gnu

tasks.label: Auto Test on Save (64bit Big Endian)
tasks.command: cargo install cargo-watch cross --quiet && cargo watch -w sewer56-archives-r3a/src -- cross test --target powerpc64-unknown-linux-gnu

tasks.label: Auto Coverage on Save
tasks.command: cargo install cargo-watch --quiet && cargo install cargo-tarpaulin --quiet && cargo watch -x "tarpaulin --skip-clean --out Xml --out Html --engine llvm --target-dir target/coverage-build" -w sewer56-archives-r3a/src

tasks.label: Generate Code Coverage
tasks.command: cargo tarpaulin --out Xml --out Html --engine llvm --target-dir target/coverage-build
